p: The differentially expressed lncRNAs and mRNAs with statistical significance were identified via volcano plot filtering. The threshold used to screen RNAs with |log 2FC| >1 was P<0.05. |log 2FC| >1 is to screen genes with multiples of difference >2 times ( 34, 35). Gene Ontology (GO) analysis ( http://www.geneontology.org) described the molecular function, cellular component and biological process of differentially expressed transcripts. GO analysis and a Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes (KEGG) analysis were applied to determine the biologic roles of these differentially expressed lncRNAs and mRNAs based on the latest KEGG data ( http://www.genome.jp/kegg/).
